it.polito.computervision.controller

Class VisualizationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.controller.VisualizationController

  • public class VisualizationController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls most of the behavior of the application. It sets up the graph with the given ontology and binds behavior to the Gestures.
    Author:
    Giovanni Piumatti

    • Method Detail

      • setPickedMode

        private void setPickedMode(boolean how)
        Toggles between picked mode and normal mode. In normal mode pan gesture is bound. In picked mode swipe gestures are.
        Parameters:
        how - true to switch to picked mode, false to normal mode.

      • updateLayout

        private void updateLayout(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode central)
        Updates the graph layout with an animated transition, and optionally centers the view to the given node.
        Parameters:
        central - The node to center the view to (can be null).

      • expandNodes

        private boolean expandNodes(java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> nodes,
                  com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode parent)
        Inserts in the graph the given nodes
        Parameters:
        nodes - The nodes to insert
        parent - The parent node
        Returns:
        true if the graph has changed, false otherwise (no nodes where added)

      • collapseNodes

        private boolean collapseNodes(java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> nodes,
                    java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> pickedNodes)
        Removes from the graph the given nodes, except for the ones that are picked.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The nodes to remove
        pickedNodes - The picked nodes
        Returns:
        true if the graph has changed, false otherwise (no node was removed).

      • toggleNodes

        private boolean toggleNodes(java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> nodes,
                  java.util.Collection<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> pickedNodes,
                  com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode parent)
        Expands/collapses nodes based on the current state
        Parameters:
        nodes - The nodes to add/remove
        pickedNodes - The picked nodes
        parent - The parent node
        Returns:
        true if the graph has changed, false otherwise

        private boolean isExpandable(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode node)
        Checks if the node is expandable based on various criteria
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        true if the node can be expanded, false otherwise
